thread.title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
thread.title_full: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days

title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
text: > Sports FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days FILE - In this May 29, 2015 file photo FIFA President Sepp Blatter, left, UEFA President Michel Platini, center, and FIFA Secretary General Jerome Valcke, right, are engaged in conversation during the 65th FIFA Congress held at the Hallenstadion in Zurich, Switzerland. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter, UEFA President Michel Platini and the former secretary general Valcke for 90 days. (Walter Bieri/Keystone via AP)
